notes:
Chat Video Pro V3.0.4 adds powerful new tools and smarter assistants.

• Bria Object Eraser — Remove unwanted objects from your footage seamlessly.
• Generate Extend — Extend any clip by 7 more seconds (up to 30s total).
• Kling Multi-Cam — Generate new camera angles and shots from your existing footage. Create complementary shots while maintaining the original cinematic motion.
• Premiere Pro Guru, Video Prompter & Story Cutter — New /commands menu, better prompts, and more story structures for docs and narrative.
• VEO 3.1 — All models now support 4K.
• Bug fixes — Home screen layout and 4K upscaling (Topaz for timeline exports) fixed.
